room_title: Escape room "Con Artist" by Escape Room Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: It sucked. Total waste of time. Really easy. Finished con-artist room in 12 minutes. Better to spend your money on hookers and booze.

room_title: Escape room "Con Artist" by Escape Room Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: We had such a great time today! Can't wait to try another room

room_title: Escape room "Con Artist" by Escape Room Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Went with my little bro and had So much fun, thanks for the extra clues Jessy!

room_title: Escape room "Con Artist" by Escape Room Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: What an interesting and exciting 60 minutes. Went with a group of long time friends and had a blast. We didn't escape but can't wait to come back and try another room. What a great night out!

room_title: Escape room "Con Artist" by Escape Room Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Travelling Crook was amazing! There was a slight hiccup in one of our very first clues and they took care of us and we got so close! With only 2 of us in the room we loved the entire process and can't wait to book our next room.

room_title: Escape room "Con Artist" by Escape Room Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: I took my staff to Escape Room this afternoon as a team-building incentive. I don't think we could have made a better choice! Our guide was helpful and in character. The room was brilliantly laid out. We will be returning soon!

room_title: Escape room "Con Artist" by Escape Room Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Awesome experience! Celebrated my sons birthday here and really enjoyed ourselves. Great bonding experience. Staff was friendly and helpful. Defently worth the time

room_title: Escape room "Con Artist" by Escape Room Virginia Beach in Virginia Beach
review: Me and my husband did this last night with a friends from out of town. It was definitely a different experience and we enjoyed it even with two clues away from getting out of the room. And even when you are teamed with people you don't know you truly do all work together to get out. I definitely think we will come back and do the other rooms!
